#hint: This language file is automaticly translated from de to en

banner.maintenance: The current server is restarted in {minute}: {sec-prefix} {sec}.

chat.not-allowed: The message was not allowed to be sent.

fallback: Unfortunately, the translation for the language "{lang}" could not be found. Therefore, you can now see everything on German.

button.add-time-hint: In {time-left} seconds, the voting is automatically terminated. Click here to reset seconds to {max-time}.

guest-input.image-hint: Here you can insert any text from which your profile picture is generated.If you do not enter anything, so we use your username.If you are users of Gravatar.com and have deposited your profile picture there, please enter your email address here.
guest-input.name: Surname

init.lost-token: Unfortunately, the user knob could not be updated.There is a renewed registration required or you play as a guest.
init.title: Werewölfe of Schüsterwald

guest.2: Your data will be deleted after the game

join-token.copy-hint: Click to copy to the clipboard
join-token.description: Give the code to your teammates:
join-token.title: Add player

close.desc: No connection to the Game Server could be established.This may be because the server is currently offline or that the lobby no longer exists.Please try to create a new lobby.
close.title: no connection to the server

1000.lobby not found: The lobby no longer exists on the server.Please create a new one.

1012: The server is currently restarted.Please create a new lobby to continue playing.

maintenance.desc: The server must be serviced and will be restarted soon.Please now ends your game and then creates a new lobby.
maintenance.title: Server maintenance

game-room.all-can-see-role-of-dead: All can see the role of the dead
game-room.auto-finish-rounds: Finally finish round if no voting exists
game-room.votings-timeout: Automatically stop voting after a timeout

player-notification.offline-player-left: A player was automatically kicked out of the game, which he is offline for 30 seconds.
